control.name: ceAllowFindFilter
control.description: Displays or hides the find panel.

control.name: ceAlwaysVisible
control.description: Specifies whether the find panel is permanently visible. Note that if the AlwaysVisible property equals true, the 'Show Close Button' check item is disabled.

control.name: ceClearFind
control.description: The ClearFindOnClose property specifies whether the Find Panel's search (filter) string is cleared when the Find Panel is hidden.

control.name: ceHighlightFindResults
control.description: Enables or disables highlighting of the search string within located records.

control.name: ceShowCloseButton
control.description: Gets or sets whether the close button is visible. Note that the close button can't be displayed if the AlwaysVisible property equals true.

control.name: ceSearchInPreview
control.description: The SearchInPreview property specifies whether Preview Sections should be included in search. Preview Section can be displayed via the ShowPreview property.

control.name: seFindDelay
control.description: Specifies the delay (in milliseconds), after which data search is initiated (if automatic search mode is active). To activate the automatic search mode use the 'Find Mode' editor.

control.name: icbFindMode
control.description: The FindMode property specifies whether data searching starts automatically, or must be started manually.

control.name: cbFindFilterColumns
control.description: The FindFilterColumns property allows you to specify the field names against which searches are performed by the Find Panel. The default value is "*", which means the Find Panel performs searches against all visible columns.
